subject: Cannot login to my account
description: I have been trying to login for the past hour but keep getting an error message. I have tried resetting my password but still cannot access my account.

subject: Payment not processed
description: My payment was declined even though my card is valid. The amount was deducted from my account but order shows as pending.

subject: App crashes on startup
description: The mobile app crashes immediately after opening. I have tried reinstalling but the issue persists.

subject: Feature suggestion for dashboard
description: It would be great to have a dark mode option in the dashboard. Many users prefer dark themes for reduced eye strain.

subject: Bug in search functionality
description: When I search for products with special characters the results are empty even though I know items exist.

subject: Refund request for order #12345
description: I received a damaged item and would like to request a full refund. Photos of the damage are attached.

subject: Two-factor authentication not working
description: I am not receiving the 2FA codes on my phone. I have verified my phone number is correct.

subject: Slow page loading times
description: The website has been extremely slow for the past few days. Pages take over 30 seconds to load.

subject: Invoice discrepancy
description: The invoice I received shows a different amount than what was agreed upon in my contract.

subject: Request for API documentation
description: I need access to the API documentation for integrating your service with our platform.

subject: Password reset link expired
description: The password reset link I received expired before I could use it. Please send a new one.

subject: Production system down
description: Our production environment is completely down and we cannot serve any customers. This is critical!

subject: Add export to PDF feature
description: Please add the ability to export reports as PDF files. Currently we can only export as CSV.

subject: Error 500 on checkout
description: I keep getting an Error 500 message when trying to complete my purchase. This is very frustrating.

subject: Unable to update profile picture
description: When I try to upload a new profile picture the page refreshes and nothing changes.

subject: Question about subscription plans
description: I would like to know the differences between the Basic and Premium subscription plans.

subject: Security concern about my account
description: I noticed some suspicious activity on my account and I am worried it may have been compromised.

subject: Duplicate charges on my card
description: I was charged twice for the same order. Please refund the duplicate charge immediately.

subject: Mobile app feature request
description: The mobile app should have offline mode so we can access our data without internet connection.

subject: Data export not working
description: The data export button does nothing when clicked. I need to export my data for a report.

subject: Account locked out
description: My account got locked after too many failed login attempts but I did not make those attempts.

subject: Integration with Slack
description: Please add a Slack integration so we can receive notifications in our team channels.

subject: Missing order confirmation
description: I placed an order yesterday but never received a confirmation email. My card was charged though.

subject: Inconsistent pricing displayed
description: The price shown on the product page differs from the price in the cart. This is confusing.

subject: Need help with ASAP deployment
description: We need assistance with deploying the solution ASAP as we have a deadline approaching.

subject: Minor UI glitch in settings
description: There is a small cosmetic issue where the checkbox alignment is off in the settings page.

subject: Cannot download invoices
description: The download button for invoices returns a 404 error. I need these for tax purposes.

subject: Blocking issue with reports
description: The reporting feature is blocking our entire workflow and we cannot proceed with our work.

subject: Suggestion for notifications
description: It would be nice if we could customize which notifications we receive and how we receive them.

subject: Website not loading at all
description: The entire website shows a blank page. I have tried multiple browsers with the same result.

subject: Need to change billing address
description: I recently moved and need to update my billing address for future invoices.

subject: Login redirects to wrong page
description: After logging in successfully I get redirected to a 404 page instead of the dashboard.

subject: Important security update needed
description: We discovered a potential security vulnerability and wanted to report it to your team.

subject: Promo code not applying
description: The promotional code SAVE20 is not applying to my cart even though it should be valid.

subject: Memory leak in application
description: The application memory usage keeps increasing over time until it crashes.

subject: Feature request for dark mode
description: I would love to see a dark mode option added to reduce eye strain during nighttime usage.

subject: Tax calculation incorrect
description: The tax amount on my invoice seems incorrect. I was charged 15% but should only pay 10%.

subject: Profile data disappeared
description: All my profile information is gone after the recent update. Name and settings are all blank.

subject: Add keyboard shortcuts
description: Please implement keyboard shortcuts for power users to navigate the application faster.

subject: Subscription auto-renewal issue
description: My subscription was auto-renewed but I had cancelled it a week ago. Please refund the charge.

subject: File upload size limit too low
description: The current 5MB file upload limit is too restrictive. We need to upload larger files.

subject: Timezone displayed incorrectly
description: All timestamps in the application show the wrong timezone even after I changed my settings.

subject: Cannot access shared workspace
description: I was invited to a shared workspace but keep getting an access denied error when I try to join.

subject: Search results not relevant
description: Search results seem to be random and not matching my query at all. Need better search algorithm.

subject: Urgent help needed with critical bug
description: We found a critical bug that is causing data loss in production. Please help immediately.

subject: API rate limiting too aggressive
description: The API rate limits are too strict for our use case. We keep hitting limits during normal operation.

subject: Currency conversion wrong
description: Prices are being converted incorrectly between currencies. I was overcharged by 20%.

subject: SSO integration not working
description: Single Sign-On with our company's identity provider is failing with authentication errors.

subject: Notification emails delayed
description: Notification emails are arriving hours after the actual events occur. They should be instant.

subject: Minor typo in help documentation
description: Found a small typo in the getting started guide. Word 'teh' should be 'the' on page 3.
